This week at The Tinkerer's Tournament: when theory (almost) meets practice...

Time to map some game rules and bring them to life! 🎮

Week's recap:
• Tuesday: Project announcement
• Thursday: ECS is FP in disguise
• Today: Example Mapping time!

Who said old blog posts couldn't be useful? 📝

Example Mapping: from rules to code

• 🧟‍♂️ Fighters charging like orcs in heat
• 👟 Runners jumping like Tyrion Lannister
• 🔥 Specialists going full Team Rocket style

Each rule becomes an example
Each example becomes a test
Each test guides the code

And somehow, it all starts making sense
(or I'm just losing my mind, could be both)

Want to see how we go from rules to working code?

Sunday on Maeevick's Bazaar:
• Walking skeleton alive
• Architecture taking shape
• First scenarios becoming code

(Not dead yet, though maybe soon 💀)

Follow the journey, here and on Maeevick's Bazaar: https://maeevick.substack.com

And yes, shameless plug: the original Example Mapping article is available for premium subscribers 😇
